placeOrder() - Method in class com.example.ru_pizzeria_android.CurrentOrderActivity
This method is called when the Place Order button is clicked and will add the current order to the total order and will update the order number.
price() - Method in class com.example.ru_pizzeria_android.src.BBQChicken
This method will calculate the price of the pizza depending on the size selected
price() - Method in class com.example.ru_pizzeria_android.src.BuildYourOwn
This method will calculate the price of the pizza depending on the size selected and will add 1.59 for every topping selected up to 7 toppings
price() - Method in class com.example.ru_pizzeria_android.src.Deluxe
This method will calculate the price of the pizza depending on the size selected
price() - Method in class com.example.ru_pizzeria_android.src.Meatzza
This method will calculate the price of the pizza depending on the size selected
price() - Method in class com.example.ru_pizzeria_android.src.Pizza
This method is meant to be overridden by the classes that extend this class and should calculate the price of the pizza depending on the size and toppings selected by the user and will add 1.59 for every topping selected up to 7 toppings
provolone - com.example.ru_pizzeria_android.src.Topping
